plot: Repeated variations of one shot, a multiple-exposure 8mm film lamenting the repetitive nature of everyday life, only made worthwhile by minor differences.
title: Vanishing-Eight
plot_es: Repeated variations of one shot, a multiple-exposure 8mm film lamenting the repetitive nature of everyday life, only made worthwhile by minor differences.
plot_en: Repeated variations of one shot, a multiple-exposure 8mm film lamenting the repetitive nature of everyday life, only made worthwhile by minor differences.
